plugins.name: remove-bg
plugins.description: Remove background from images and trim transparent edges. Supports threshold-based (fast) and AI-based (rembg) methods.

plugins.name: worktree
plugins.description: Manage git worktrees for parallel development. Create worktrees, sync changes (spotlight), merge branches, and cleanup.

plugins.name: epub-packing
plugins.description: Generate professional EPUB ebooks from Markdown files with auto-generated neo-brutalism covers.
